Lukman Alade Fakeye (amụrụ na June 25, 1983, na Ibadan ) bụ onye Naijiria na-akpụ ihe na onye jị osisi akpu ihe, onye si mpaghara Yoruba. Ọ bụ nwa nwanne Lamidi Olonade Fakeye, onye pịrị ọnụ ụzọ nke African Room na Kennedy Center na Washington, DC Lukman malitere ịrụ ọrụ ya na nna ya, Akin Fakeye, mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu.
Lukman Alade Fakeye gụrụ nka na imewe ihe na The Polytechnic, Ibadan, ebe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Best Student in Sculpture ugboro abụọ
A pụrụ ịhụ ọrụ Fakeye na nchịkọta ọha na nke onwe na Nigeria, United States, na United Kingdom.
